projects.title: Apigalypsis
projects.description: UI/UX Learning Adventure - Adaptation of the Royal Game of Goose

features.title: First Make It Work
features.description: Started with core game logic and mechanics. Focused on getting the gameplay systems functional before any visual polish - making sure the dice rolls, movement, and game rules worked correctly.

features.title: Then Make It Beautiful
features.description: Transformed the functional prototype into a polished experience. This project was an adventure in game feel - exploring animations, transitions, visual feedback, and UI polish to create satisfying player interactions and responsive design.

features.title: Farm-Themed Tiles
features.description: Created all the art assets myself. Designed custom farm-themed tiles with bridges, fields, and agricultural elements to build a cohesive visual identity for the game board.

features.title: Reach the End to Free Your Species
features.description: Victory condition: guide your bee through the perilous farm board to reach the end and achieve freedom. Complete the journey to liberate your species from the dangers of the agricultural world.

features.title: Or Die to the Farmers
features.description: The stakes are high - land on the wrong tiles and face defeat at the hands of the farmers. Avoid hazards and dangerous spaces or meet your end in this risky adventure.

items: Everything programmed and designed by me - all game logic, UI/UX implementation, animations, and visual polish
UI/UX learning project exploring game feel and player feedback
Adaptation of the Royal Game of Goose with custom farm theme
All art assets created by me

projects.title: Ko-Fi Engine
projects.description: Custom C++ Game Engine - Foundation for Dune Special Spice Ops

features.title: Physics System
features.description: Custom physics implementation with collision detection, rigid body dynamics, and force calculations. Built from scratch to provide realistic object interactions and movement.

features.title: Animation Module
features.description: Skeletal animation system with keyframe interpolation and animation blending. Supports complex character movements and smooth transitions between animation states.

features.title: Camera System
features.description: Flexible camera implementation with multiple view modes, smooth movement controls, and follow mechanics. Supports both 2D and 3D camera perspectives.

features.title: Particle Effects
features.description: Advanced particle system for creating visual effects like explosions, smoke, fire, and environmental ambience. Features emitter configurations and particle lifecycle management.

features.title: Shader Pipeline
features.description: Custom shader system supporting vertex and fragment shaders for advanced rendering effects. Enables visual polish and specialized graphical features.

features.title: Scripting System
features.description: Integrated scripting framework allowing gameplay logic implementation. Provides flexibility for rapid prototyping and game behavior customization.

features.title: User Interface
features.description: UI framework for creating menus, HUD elements, and interactive interface components. Supports text rendering, buttons, and layout management.

projects.title: The Tower
projects.description: Mobile Clicker & Builder Game - Final Degree Thesis Study Case

features.title: Kings Need Towers
features.description: Construct structures for monarchs without castles, progressing through increasingly difficult construction challenges across different environments. Build towers for kingdoms using hammer-based mechanics where skill progression unlocks superior tools.

features.title: Grab a Hammer
features.description: Use hammer-based mechanics to build towers, where skill progression unlocks superior tools and abilities for more efficient construction.

features.title: NPC Recruitment & Resource Management
features.description: Recruit NPCs through resource management by providing food and security. Manage reputation system affecting job difficulty and complexity while balancing resource allocation.

features.title: Environmental Hazards
features.description: Face extreme weather conditions and freezing mechanics that challenge tower construction. Navigate environmental obstacles while maintaining building progress and worker safety.

features.title: Get Paid
features.description: Earn rewards and currency by completing construction jobs and satisfying client requirements. Manage your earnings to unlock new tools, hire workers, and expand your building capabilities.

features.title: Progression & Reward System
features.description: Complete levels to earn rewards funding further progression. Part of final degree thesis 'Fun in simplicity' - demonstrating engaging gameplay through streamlined mechanics.

features.title: Under the Scenes
features.description: Behind-the-scenes look at how diverse environments were created using minimal assets. Demonstrates efficient game development through smart asset reuse and strategic placement to build rich, varied worlds from a limited set of elements.

items: Everything programmed by me - all gameplay systems, UI, progression mechanics, and game logic
Solo development project completed as final degree thesis study case
Integrated third-party assets: 3D models and More Mountains tools
Intended for publication as debut commercial game release

projects.title: Fire Fighters
projects.description: Online Multiplayer Battle Royale - Network Programming Showcase

features.title: Log In System
features.description: Player authentication and connection system for joining multiplayer matches. Handles client login, user identification, and initial server handshake for game sessions.

features.title: Fire Alive
features.description: Dynamic fire mechanics creating gameplay tension and environmental hazards. Fire spreads across the island, forcing players into smaller play areas as the match progresses.

features.title: Latency Hiding
features.description: Interpolation techniques to smooth player movement and hide network latency. Implements prediction and position updates to maintain responsive gameplay despite network conditions.

features.title: Last Remaining Wins
features.description: Battle royale victory condition - survive longer than all opponents to claim victory. Players compete until only one firefighter remains standing on the shrinking island.

items: Everything programmed by me - all networking systems, gameplay logic, client-server architecture, and multiplayer synchronization
Built custom UDP networking implementation from scratch
Implemented latency hiding, world state replication, and packet management
Five-month university assignment completed as solo programmer
Battle royale mechanics: last remaining player wins

skills.sectionSubtitle: Tools and technologies I work with

skillsList.title: Unity Development
skillsList.description: I've worked as a Unity developer for quite a few international brands, implementing game design documents while sorting technical challenges. Delivering beautiful worlds for clients at aimed fps, rest easy knowing your clients are in good hands, and I've yet to encounter a feature I couldn't deliver on.

skillsList.title: C/C++ Engine Programming
skillsList.description: The key is behind the scenes. I've developed solo and team projects combining C and C++ to build software that becomes a game. I built an entire animation module for an engine, understanding how everything is just processed data being interpreted, making a 3D mesh modify its shape. I made contributions to other modules, gaining a deeper understanding of how game engines work. This knowledge helped me solve many problems in commercial engines.

skillsList.title: Git & Version Control
skillsList.description: Experienced in collaborative development using Git. I design modular projects to minimize merge conflicts and am careful about file modifications in shared repositories. This approach keeps team workflows smooth and avoids uncomfortable merges.
